title: formState.errors does not update on useForm.trigger
body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/discussions/5843
Originally posted by **JimmyRowland** July 6, 2021 **Describe the bug** formState.errors does not update on useForm.trigger. **To Reproduce** 1. Go to [codesandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/dry-pine-eyskx?file=/src/App.jsx) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16997894/124546911-2e0dc800-dde0-11eb-89fe-36f84f2f081f.png) 2. Click on YES radio button for the first radio group ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16997894/124546932-3534d600-dde0-11eb-9125-66bf7e92e979.png) 3. Enter 222 in Any number input field and click out ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16997894/124547001-51387780-dde0-11eb-8503-f7f0111f7a03.png) Which will trigger setError on a hiddenNumberName input field 4. Enter 22 in Any number input field and click out ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16997894/124547180-9b215d80-dde0-11eb-9522-9fcf60702f32.png) Which will trigger setValue and trigger on hiddenNumberName input field. 5. See bug. At this point, the error message should disappear, but error message only disappears on the next onBlur event. **Codesandbox link (Required)** https://codesandbox.io/s/dry-pine-eyskx?file=/src/App.jsx **Expected behavior** The error message should disappear when the user inputs 22 and click out. **Desktop (please complete the following information):** - OS: [Ubuntu 20.04] - Browser [chrome] - Version [90.0.4430.85] **Additional context** Calling trigger after the first validate event fixed the bug, but it would be nice to have a better solution. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16997894/124547777-81cce100-dde1-11eb-8f33-ec57a8447f06.png)
